title: 【速报】美国计划撤离钻石公主号上的所有美国人
contents:
TOKYO: The United States plans to evacuate Americans from the Diamond Princess cruise ship held in quarantine at a Japanese port since early February, the US embassy said Saturday (Feb 15).

Washington will send a plane to Japan for the evacuation on Sunday, it said in a letter to US citizens on board, adding that evacuees will still be required to undergo a further quarantine of two weeks after their arrival in the US.


https://www.channelnewsasia.com/news/world/covid19-coronavirus-us-evacuate-diamond-princess-japan-12438432
